about_the_game: Fight zombies, gather resources and upgrade your base. The game is a 3D Zombie Base Builder Defense Game. Survive in this freezing winter or let it consume you. The game is set in the winter where you have a bunker which you can expand, upgrade and built defenses. Get better weapons to survive ever evolving zombie waves. You will be able to use tools such as axes and pickaxes to get resources. You will need to use a workbench and other benches to build your base. The game will be built on a grid layout and everything will be built in square cube areas. You will start off with a both and dagger and will have to build better weapons to survive.
